definition: incapable of being changed or moved or undone
details:
adjective
- incapable of being changed or moved or undone
= example: incapable of being changed or moved or undone
= synonyms: fixed
- not convertible to cash
= example: not convertible to cash
- (used of foods) preserved by freezing sufficiently rapidly to retain flavor and nutritional value
= example: (used of foods) preserved by freezing sufficiently rapidly to retain flavor and nutritional value
= synonyms: flash-frozen
- turned into ice
- devoid of warmth and cordiality
= synonyms: icy, frigid, glacial, frosty
- not thawed
- absolutely still
= synonyms: stock-still
